thread.title: Food good...service needs improvement
thread.title_full: Food good...service needs improvement - Review of Eight Restaurant, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: vuyo m
title: Food good...service needs improvement
text:
The food was fresh ans tasted great and definately worth a second visit.
What i found disappointing is our waitress Diedre who basically left us at our table and never bothered to check on us. We ended up being served by every passing waiter and at some stage the manager..the service dampened the experience.
